title: and then there was one empty slot

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Grant Invincible Defense to yourself and the Empty Slot (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, one non-Neutral player becomes your Empty Slot. They will lose all abilities and attributes, and retain only their alignment and goal.
- If you die, they get their abilities and attributes back.
- Each attack survived by you or the Empty Slot gives you one additional use of your defense ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure your Empty Slot survives the game.
